appDescription.message: Use the Environment Marker extension and prevent screw-ups with the (programming) environments.

__URL__.message: URL (use 'regex:' prefix to match a host by RegEx)

__ImportExportInstructions__.message: You can import or export your configurations to share with your team.

__ImportInstructions__.message: You can either import using a local file or a hosted file.

__ImportUsingLocalFile__.description: Import using a local file instructions text.

__ImportErrorMessage__.message: An unexpected error occoured while importing the file.

__ImportInvalidJsonMessage__.message: The configuration file is not valid.

__ImportHostedFile__.description: Import a hosted file label message.

__URLNotValid__.description: The URL is not valid message.

__AutomaticallyImport__.message: Automatically import in case of changes in the hosted file.

__ExportInstructions__.message: Click the button below to export your current settings.

__ToggleInstructions__.message: Click on the following button to temporarily Hide/Show the label:

__GoToConfiguration__.message: or go to configuration page.
__GoToConfiguration__.description: Go to the configuration page text.

__ToggleNotPossible__.message: It is not possible to toggle visibility for this URL because you have not configured it yet.

__TemporarilyToggle__.message: Click on the following button to temporarily Hide/Show the label:

__EnvMarkerNotAvailableError__.message: Environment Marker is not available on this page. The extension only works on web pages. Refresh the page.
__EnvMarkerNotAvailableError__.description: Environment Marker is not available error message.
